original_title: My Friends Tigger & Pooh: The Nature Of Things
overview: Another collection of adventures for Winnie the Pooh and his friends in the Hundred Acre Wood. In this instalment, Roo wonders why the snowman he has built keeps getting smaller, while Piglet is surprised that a cave is talking back to him.
title: My Friends Tigger & Pooh:  The Nature Of Things
